opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with forgery. Before ATKINS, P.J. Appeals, Nos. 57 and 58, March T., 1973, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas of York County, Jan. T., 1972, Nos. 165 and 166. Submitted March 12, 1973.
opinion.attorneys: Gerald E.Ruth, Public Defender, for appellant; Morrison B. Williams, First Assistant District Attorney, and Harold N. Fitzkee, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
